item.title: Recent publications
item.description: SPE (Society of Petroleum Engineers) paper Ge, Xiaojing, Lu, Rong, Biheri, Ghith, Imqam, Abdulmohsin, and Baojun Bai. “Prediction of Single Proppant Terminal Settling Velocity in High Viscosity Friction Reducers by Using Artificial Neural Networks and XGBoost.” Paper presented at the SPE Western Regional Meeting, Anchorage, Alaska, USA, May 2023. doi: https://doi.org/10.2118/212964-MS

item.title: Today's talk: 10 data management automation projects making work faster, safer and stronger
item.description: In March 2023, I gave a talk at company’s annual Digital Expo. The three images illustrate the high-level ideas: what was the problem to be solved? ten deliverables methodology Interested to know more? I can be reached at rong dot lu at bp dot com.
